Class IPUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudifysource.dsl.utils.IPUtils

public final class IPUtils
extends Object

A utility class for IP manipulation and validation.

ipCIDR2Range

public static String ipCIDR2Range(String ipCidr)
                           throws UnknownHostException,
                                  IllegalArgumentException
Converts a CIDR IP format to an IP range format (e.g. 192.168.9.60/31 becomes 192.168.9.60 - 192.168.9.61)

Parameters:
ipCidr - IP addresses formatted as CIDR
Returns:
IP addresses formatted as a simple range
Throws:
UnknownHostException - Indicates the given IP cannot be resolved
IllegalArgumentException - Indicates the given IP is invalid

Parameters:

                               throws IOException

ipAddress - The IP address to connect to
port - The port number to use
timeout - The time to wait before timing out, in seconds
Throws:

validatePortIsFreeInRange

public static void validatePortIsFreeInRange(String host,
                                             int lowestPort,
                                             int highestPort)
                                      throws UnknownHostException,
                                             IOException,
                                             SecurityException
Validates the at least one port in the specified range is free on the given host.

Parameters:
host - the host to validate
lowestPort - The lowest port number in the port range to validate
highestPort - The highest port number in the port range to validate
Throws:
UnknownHostException - Reports the IP address of the host could not be determined.
IOException - Reports an I/O error occurs when creating the socket.
SecurityException - Reports a failure to connect or resolve the given address.

safeLongToInt

public static int safeLongToInt(long longValue,
                                boolean roundIfNeeded)
Safely casts long to int.

Parameters:
longValue - The long to cast
roundIfNeeded - Indicating whether to change the value of the number if it exceeds int's max/min values. If set to false and the long is too large/small, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
Returns:
int representing of the given long.

isSameIpv6Address

public static boolean isSameIpv6Address(String address1,
                                        String address2)
Compares two IPv6 addresses. The addresses can be in the full format, short format or iPv4MappedIPv6Address. If an IPv6 address is mis-formatted, False is returned.

Parameters:
address1 - The first IPv6 address.
address2 - The second IPv6 address.
Returns:
True if the two addresses represent the same address, False otherwise.

isSameIpAddress

public static boolean isSameIpAddress(String address1,
                                      String address2)
Compares two IP addresses. The addresses can be in the full IPv6 format, short format or iPv4MappedIPv6Address. If the IP address is empty or mis-formatted, False is returned.

Parameters:
address1 - The first IP address.
address2 - The second IP address.
Returns:
True if the two addresses represent the same address, False otherwise.

isIPv6Address

public static boolean isIPv6Address(String ipAddress)
Chechs if the given address is an IPv6 address.

Parameters:
ipAddress - IP address
Returns:
True is the address represents and IPv6 address, False otherwise

getSafeIpAddress

public static String getSafeIpAddress(String ipAddress)
Returns a "safe" formatted IP address - IPv4 addresses are not changed, IPv6 addresses may change - if they include an "interface" section it is removed, and the address itself is surrounded by brackets ("[]") to allow for port concatenation.

Parameters:
ipAddress - The ipAddress to handle
Returns:
an IP address, "safe" for concatenation.

getHostFromFullAddress

public static String getHostFromFullAddress(String ipAddress)
Gets the host name/address from a full address. Examples: [fe80::9da2:25f7:86ce:cddb%45]:4174 will be returned as fe80::9da2:25f7:86ce:cddb [fe80::9da2:25f7:86ce:cddb]:4174 will be returned as fe80::9da2:25f7:86ce:cddb mylocalhost:4174 will be returned as mylocalhost 127.0.0.1:4174 will be returned as 127.0.0.1 127.0.0.1 will be returned as 127.0.0.1

Parameters:
ipAddress - the address to parse
Returns:
only the host name / address part from the full address.

getPortFromFullAddress

public static int getPortFromFullAddress(String ipAddress)
Gets the port number from a full address.

Parameters:
ipAddress - the address to parse
Returns:
the port included in the full address, as int.

getRestProtocol

public static String getRestProtocol()
Gets the relevant rest protocol, considering the SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE environment variable.

Returns:
https if the rest server is secured, http otherwise.

isValidPortRange

public static boolean isValidPortRange(String portRange)
Validates the given String as a port range.

Parameters:
portRange - the port range to validate
Returns:
True - is the given string is a valid port range, False otherwise.

isValidPortNumber

public static boolean isValidPortNumber(int portNumber)
Validates the given number as a port number. A valid port value is between 0 and 65535.

Parameters:
portNumber - the port number to validate
Returns:
True - is the given number is a valid port number, False otherwise.

getMinimumPort

public static int getMinimumPort(String portRange)
Returns the minimum port (i.e. the starting port) specified by the given range.

Parameters:
portRange - the range to parse
Returns:
the minimum port specified by the given range

getMaximumPort

public static int getMaximumPort(String portRange)
Returns the maximum port (i.e. the ending port) specified by the given range.

Parameters:
portRange - the range to parse
Returns:
the maximum port specified by the given range

createLocatorsString

                                          int port)
Creates a compatible LOOKUPLOCATORS string from one or more locators.

Parameters:
locators - the locators.
port - the LUS port.
Returns:
the LOOKUPLOCATORS string.
